NASDAQ: LSCC -19
Business Ethics
§At Lattice, we can’t “do it right” as a company unless each 
and every employee takes responsibility
§That is why we have a company Code of Conduct, a 
Whistleblower Hotline, and an Insider Trading Policy
§Employees are always encouraged to speak up with their 
concerns or questions to management or HR
§Our team is trained, and our expectations are documented
§Code of Conduct
§Whistleblower Hotline
§Insider Trading Policy
Do It Right, The First TimeCORE VALUES
